6.1.name: wordpress/information-reel
6.1.description:
Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2011/04/16/wordpress-plugin-information-reel/

  1. Live Demo
  2. Screen shots
  3. Video tutorial
  4. About author

Information Reel wordpress plugin create the reel type scroll in the website widget. The scroll contain the entered title, image, and description. This is best way to announce your messages to user.

Feature of this plugin

  1. Easy installation.
  2. Easy customization.
  3. Easy scroll set
